title: Unfair bans and stuff.
body:
I'm seriously done with this game... the bans are so unfair. My internet turns off and on because it is sht, sometimes i restart it because i get 1k ping and i know i know, some people are going to say ''It's your fault for having sht internet'' or something like that but... i'd be more helpful if i reconnected with better ping rather than feeding. I seriously keep getting banned. 5 games, i wait 5-10-20-30 minutes just for a game, seriously! Do something about this sht man...  I'm not sending a ticket and wait for days, maybe even weeks just for a fuking reply. Here's a tip Riot: If you want to keep your players, unban me ;D. No i'm serious, unban me... I will go complain to my internet provider  now.

Thank you for reading this absolute useless thread.

replies.body: How long does it usually take you to reconnect? If you do it in under five minutes then you don't get a leave-marker added to your account.
same here in my case my laptop gets over heated n shuts down n now i have to wait 5min hope this thing is removed really like this game but will stop playing if this carries on
